import React, {useState} from 'react'
import details from '../pages/Home'

const lat = ''
const lon = ''

export default function coordinates (results) {
    // GeoApify gets Lat/Long
    fetch(`https://api.geoapify.com/v1/geocode/search?city=${city}&state=${state}&format=json&apiKey=27a84d7b0c1b4d52b41acc3e82bbe239`)
    .then(setLat=(results.lat.value))
    .then(setLon=(results.lon.value))
    .then(console.log(lat, lon))
}


module.exports = [coordinates, lat, lon]
